Player History
Moved to the US and entered the free agent pool in 2021.
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/2/2021 to a 7-year deal worth $12,500,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2021, off Kenhachirou Honzo (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2021, off Tony Olivera (STL)...
Drove in 7 runs against St. Louis (C) on 5/29/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2021, hitting .448 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2021, hitting .279 with 24 HR, 108 RBI...
Won MVP in 2021, hitting .279 with 24 HR, 108 RBI...
